data.eml:eml: New species of earthworms belonging to the Metaphire formosae species group (Clitellata: Megascolecidae) in Taiwan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chang, Chih-Han, Chuang, Shu-Chun, Wu, Jia Hsing, Chen, Jiun-Hong (2014): New species of earthworms belonging to the Metaphire formosae species group (Clitellata: Megascolecidae) in Taiwan. Zootaxa 3774 (4): 324-332, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3774.4.2
